    • Ldistance

      private static int Ldistance​(String word1, String word2)
      This function computes the levenshtein distance between two words. We use the results to rank suggestions of words.
      Type Parameters:
      word1 - the first word to compare
      word2 - the second word to compare
      Returns:
      The levenshtein distance between the two words

    • generate_possibilities

      private static ArrayList<String> generate_possibilities​(String word)
      function that generates all possiblities for words to be cross referenced with dictionary words
      Parameters:
      word - to generate possibilities
      Returns:
      An arraylist of possible words based on a missplled word

      Parameters:
      word - to spellcheck
      Returns:
      return a list of words from the dictionary that to suggest
